title: Opolo Tasting
description:
Join us for our weekly wine tasting this Wednesday, October 30th, from 4-7 PM at Whispering Vine’s South Creek location! For $25, enjoy a 3oz tasting of four exceptional wines from Opolo Vineyards:

  • Opolo Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 – $29.99 (93 Tasting Panel)
  • Opolo Cabernet Sauvignon Summit Creek 2021 – $19.99 (92 Vinous)
  • Opolo Summit Creek Zinfandel 2022 – $19.99
  • Opolo Summit Creek Merlot 2021 – $19.99


As a bonus, purchase any bottle from the tasting and your tasting is free! Come savor these standout wines and explore the bold flavors of Paso Robles!
